article: beninese president thomas boni yayi , togolese president faure gnassingbe , eritrean president isaias afwerki , zimbabwean president robert gabriel mugabe , and nigerien president mamadou tandja said their countries will firmly pursue the one-china policy .
abstract: five african countries reiterate adherence to one-china policy
